name: U. S. Steel Košice, s.r.o.
bossPosition: VP External Affairs, Administration and Business Development
goal: U. S. Steel Košice, s.r.o. ( USSK)  is a fully integrated flat rolled steel producer located in Košice, Slovakia. USSK is an indirect subsidiary of United States Steel Corporation, which is a major steel producer based in United States. It is one of the largest private employers in Slovakia with more than 10,000 employees.USSK has annual raw steel production capability of 4.5 million metric tonnes. Principal products include hot-rolled, cold-rolled and hot dip galvanized and color coated sheets and tin mill products. In addition it also produces spiral welded pipes and panel radiators.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
-The EU Emission Trading Scheme (ETS)
-EU Trade Defence Mechanisms
-Anti-Dumping Methodology
